excerpts.title: Tales update: Spanish Translation
excerpts.body:
v1.1 of my Tales WordPress theme includes a new Spanish translation.
Many thanks to Mike Walsh for contributing the translation and adapting my theme for his own website Imaginalgo — looks great!

See my blog post “Introducing Tales” for more information about the theme.

excerpts.title: Introducing Tales
excerpts.body:
